LanguageData.Orassan.label: Orassan Enclave
LanguageData.Orassan.description: A small community of Orassans.\n\nThese people have come here to expand the borders of their empire by trading and diplomacy.
LanguageData.OrassanEvil.label: Orassan Enclave Evil
LanguageData.OrassanEvil.description: A small community of evil Orassans.\n\nThese people have come here to expand the borders of their empire by wars and conquests.
